page.title: 09Finding an owl in Uyeasound.
page.content: I found a dead owl in the Playpark.We took it into school and tried to identify it using books but we could not.We took the owl to a Uyeasound man who is interested in and knows about birds.He helped identify the owl.We found out it was a short-eared owl.The man who identified the owl told us how to identify this species in flight. There is a dark band across the underside of the wing.The tufts of feathers on the head are not really the owl's ears, they are what give the owl its name. The owl had no food in its crop and it was in very thin and in poor condition.The owl had died of starvation.The owl was probably blown off course when flying from the South to the North of Norway.
